body_html:
For people landing here from Google who Just Want To Build The Thing, until this is fixed properly I can around this issue by specifying -march=broadwell during configure.

Instead I just get this warning, when trying to use the library:

The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX512F instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
body_text:
For people landing here from Google who Just Want To Build The Thing, until this is fixed properly I can around this issue by specifying -march=broadwell during configure.
Instead I just get this warning, when trying to use the library:
The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX512F instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
body:
For people landing here from Google who Just Want To Build The Thing, until this is fixed properly I can around this issue by specifying `-march=broadwell` during configure.

Instead I just get this warning, when trying to use the library:
```
The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX512F instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
```
